thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 5 of 171
thread.title: Terry Gaboury

author: Terry Gaboury
title: Terry Gaboury
text: When I started house sitting, it was always through the real world for friends & acquaintances & people who they knew. So I was a little nervous going out to house sits where I didn't know anyone at all. Trustedhousesitters helps bridge the information gap & build trusted relationships before ever meeting. The information on everyone's profiles gives a great starting point for questions you might have before your initial conversation.
